headline: Airbnb to Move Property Managers to a ‘Single-Fee’ Payment System
summary: You can expect many hosts to switch to the single-fee model, where guests won't see a service fee when booking. The alternative is to lose a lot of business.

raw.headline: Airbnb to Move Property Managers to a ‘Single-Fee’ Payment System
raw.summary: You can expect many hosts to switch to the single-fee model, where guests won't see a service fee when booking. The alternative is to lose a lot of business.

headline: CRA denied taxpayer benefits because of his Airbnb classification
summary: Jamie Golombek: How you earn income on your short-term rental can determine benefits and deductions you are allowed

headline: Should Joe Gebbia's Federal Design Role Shift Investor Perceptions of Airbnb (ABNB) Leadership?
summary: In August 2025, President Donald Trump announced the appointment of Airbnb co-founder Joe Gebbia as the nation's first Chief Design Officer to modernize federal digital services and physical infrastructure through a newly established National Design Studio. This unprecedented federal role highlights Gebbia's design credentials on a national stage and elevates the public profile of Airbnb's leadership in digital innovation. We'll examine how Gebbia's prominent federal appointment could...
